acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This portion of the Massey Faulkner collection was placed on deposit on 14 November 1966 and later changed to a gift on 14 August 1967.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains, 1956-1961, n.d., manuscripts by Faulkner and screenplays by others. Faulkner manuscripts include Today We Live, 1933 April 8, The Reivers, 1961 August 21 and notes regarding an unidentified screenplay, ca. 1936. Screenplays by others include James Poe's Sanctuary, 1960, and Irving Ravetch's and Harriet Frank's The Long Hot Summer, 1957, which they based on Faulkner's The Hamlet. There is also a copy of the stage production of Requiem For a Nunby Lemuel Ayers.
